Sai uses his [[Super Beast Imitating Drawing]] to create dozens of lions which shower down on the opponent. He then creates a giant dragon, finishing them off.

== Trivia ==
* {{translation|"[[wikipedia:Hyakki Yakō|Hyakki Yakō]]"|百鬼夜行}} is a Japanese saying referring to many demons, monsters, and spirits wandering through the night in a line, or many people plotting together and doing evil.
